OrgName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE POLICE AUTHORITYS INDEPENDENT CUSTODY VISITING SCHEME

AltName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE INDEPENDENT CUSTODY VISITING SCHEME - FORMER NAME

Desc.entry: Enables custody visitors within the community to visit police stations at any time to observe, comment and report on the treatment and conditions of those being detained in police stations. Applicants must be aged over 18 years.
